name: bluesky-atproto-utilities
title: Bluesky/ATproto Utilities
description: Various helper commands to work with Bluesky/ATproto URLs, handles, DIDs, etc.
author: hrbrmstr

commands.name: convert-handle-to-did-plc
commands.title: Convert handle to did:plc
commands.description: Takes in a Bluesky handle link or a bare handle and returns the did:plc for it.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
